casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Michael REED 365A16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 2, 2018 E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Reed, David Michael.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of February 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of February 2018."
